message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I appreciate the offer, but let's meet halfway. 55-45 seems fairer.
I see you're willing to negotiate, let's try 57-43.
Time is running out, let's settle this. 52.5-47.5 is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a risk. 58-42 is my new proposal.
This is getting ridiculous. 50-50 is the only fair option. Take it or leave it.
